replies.body: Daniel, After the update you need to reinsert the HB_addHBGlz component. See that the first input name changed. The updater can't solve well those cases. -A. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/UUHZoZFGT4g7P5bbU0Kkrf0bXZnTT6Z9bFwtnWgXqzcFsb-rZxFIy88ufhUQsB2XzFVd33ioqxWn-L32wi0IxP0pRJxH0rtf/Capture.JPG)

Yes, I did that, but the component I drag into the canvas is dated with february 2014 again...

Obviously only the components within the canvas get updated ... ?

D

The UpdateAllObjects should do the trick. You set it to true. So it is weird that you still get the old version ...

-A.

Hm...

I'll try to set it up again completely. Let's see what will happen.

Thx.

D
